22In 2018, Western Digital’s direct (scope 1) GHG emissions 
within our operational control totaled 46,269.3 tons of CO2 
equivalent (CO2e)—a 17% decrease from 2016. Scope 1 
emissions were 50,190.2 tons of CO2e in 2017 and 56,189.6 
tons of CO2e in 2016. Western Digital used the Greenhouse 
Gas Protocol: A Corporate Accounting and Reporting 
Standard (Revised Edition) in compiling this data.305-1
Western Digital’s total location-based scope 2 emissions 
within our operational control equaled 1.1 million tons of CO2 
equivalent. Western Digital referred to the World Resources 
Institute for conversion factors in our countries of operation and to the Greenhouse Gas Protocol: A Corporate Accounting and Reporting Standard (Revised Edition)
